about_the_game:
Action Roguelite


Risk the Dark is a real-time action roguelite where you play as a survivor struggling to escape formidable darkness.
With the interplay of light and dark, various heavy and survival mechanics come together to create an immersive and challenging experience.
Explore the shadows, grow in strength, and find the exit.

Isolated in the Darkness




After the 'Tearing', the monsters emerged. During the struggle, a thrown grenade left you stranded in an unknown cave.
Alive but shaken, you discover that you are not alone.
Risk the Dark to survive.

Light and Darkness




In the smothering darkness, create light sources to serve as your eyes. Using these resources, illuminate your path and dispel the gloom.

Various Combat Styles




Enhance and complement your build to get the most out of your journey.
With melee, ranged attacks, throwables, and elemental combat options, mix and match to create a diverse play style.
Use equipment, modding, consumables, and accessories, as well as the skill mastery system to support your decision.
With the right set of skills, you will show them that it doesn’t take a hero to Risk the Dark.

Special Boss Fights




At the end of each area, you will face an especially fearsome foe.
Evade their attacks and strike their weak points to take them down and prove that you are not an easy target.
